title: Cass chroma(s) not compatible with the recall update in 7.5?
body: The recall update for all those older champions was supposed to give them actual recall animations, correct? Well, it didn't seem to work when I used the black Cass chroma (not sure if the other ones are affected aswell) but I just wanted to let you know that you apparently forgot to include it.

replies.body: Ah, weird. I'll look into it tomorrow. Chromas should have had the same file structure, but I guess Cass' needed their own for some reason. I'll fix it up for next patch.
Also any word on the tail-update that was suppsed to go live in 7.4 (according to the patchnotes) and yet never made it onto live-servers? Still no trace of it in 7.5 either.
Yeah, it was shelved to put a little more polish onto it. Due to an error on our end, it wasn't removed from the patch notes. We're still talking about shipping it soon.

We're at patch 7.8 and still no sign of the tail-update, this is simply sad.

What is going on? Did the project get abandoned? Is there any hope of her ever getting a skin if this fails? She already has been waiting for more than 4 years now in that regard, this update is extremely necessary.

So... any hope of seeing it finished on patch 7.7? Or do we have to wait yet again? 

Still no sign of it on 7.6.

> [{quoted}](name=Canastus,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mZGyrKN2,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-09T01:48:46.883+0000)
>
> The recall update for all those older champions was supposed to give them actual recall animations, correct? Well, it didn&#039;t seem to work when I used the black Cass chroma (not sure if the other ones are affected aswell) but I just wanted to let you know that you apparently forgot to include it.

they prob forgot about them, as hardly anymore buy them
